paragraphs.text: One, the power of the story isn’t the sign that says “For Sale”. The power of the story is what we imagine about the story. The story invites you to control the story. The story gives you agency.
paragraphs.name: 335e

paragraphs.text: The unspoken word at the beginning of “Make America Great Again” is not “You.” It’s “Let’s.” And, in truth, Obama’s slogan was even better: “Yes, We Can!”
